about.title: About Me
info: Hi, this is Patrick, a code artist with a knack for front-end development and a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JS.
I'm familiar with the basics of React.js (and keen to learn more).
While exploring front-end technologies, I've started building projects in parallel.
Through these projects, I've learned how Git works and how to handle API calls.
I'm passionate about leveraging my skills to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.

proj_list.proj_desc: It is designed based on concept of Music System , it follows CRUD operation, where we can create a new song, play it and update the details of the song. Tech Stacks: HTML, Bootstrap, JS.
In this project, Handling API call is major concern with hooks such as useState() and useEffect() in React.js. From the API we get random jokes. Tech Stacks used: HTML, CSS, JS, React.js.
This project is similar as CRUD operation, but the difference is, it is developed in React Framework and hooks such as useState() used. Tech Stacks used: HTML, CSS, JS, React.js.
This project is similar as Joke Generator, but the difference here is, the value retured from one API call is send to another API call as parameter (i.e. lat and lon is passed).
This Project is developed based on React Framework, where props, and hooks like useState() is used. It is Responsive. Tech Stacks used: HTML, CSS, JS, React.js.
In this Project, I've explained about myself, my skills, and the projects I've done. The information given in the portfolio are driven from json file that I've created.
